definitions.definition: to breathe in quickly and repeatedly through the nose, usually because you are crying or because you have a cold:
examples: He was snuffling and blowing his nose.

definitions.definition: (of an animal) to breathe in quickly and repeatedly through the nose while smelling something:
examples: The dog snuffled around and began digging at the base of the tree.

definitions.definition: an act or sound of snuffling
a slight cold that mainly affects your nose:
examples: I had a cold a couple of weeks ago and it's left me with a snuffle.
